Package imusim :: Package trajectories :: Module splined :: Class SplinedRotationTrajectory

Class SplinedRotationTrajectory

source code

Trajectory with rotation obtained by splining a sampled trajectory.

__init__(self, sampled, smoothRotations=True, rotationStdDev=0.001, **kwargs)
(Constructor)

source code 

Initialise trajectory.

Parameters:
  • sampled - rotation samples (SampledPositionTrajectory)
  • smoothRotations - `True` to apply smoothing to rotation prior to splining (Bool)
  • rotationStdDev - standard deviation of rotation samples (float)
